Today in Gower, it's looking good with 4ft @7s W swell and moderate 12 mph WNW winds. Broughton Bay and Llangennith Beach are your top picks, especially during the best tide windows. Tomorrow, conditions drop with 5ft @8s W swell but fresh 27 mph NW winds will make it blown out across the board. Day after brings cleaner 5ft @10s W swell with light 8 mph NW winds, perfect for a fun session at spots like Broughton Bay and Llangennith Beach. Best: today.
